Original meaning 本义: Meaning the declining sun in the west

昳字的基本解释

昳
dié
（太阳）偏西：“诸客奔走市买，至日昳皆会。”

昳
yì
〔昳丽〕美丽，如“邹忌脩八尺有余，而形貌昳昳。”

昳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dié］
［《廣韻》徒結切，入屑，定。］
(1)太阳偏西；日落。
(2)光艳。参见“昳麗”。

昳字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　昳； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页494第05
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】徒結切【正韻】杜結切，?音耋。【說文】日?也。【書·無逸】自朝至于日中昊。【傳】朝至日昳。【疏】昊亦名昳，言日蹉跌而下，謂未時也。【前漢·游俠傳】至日昳皆會。

昳字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
昳字的起名意思

：本义指日过午偏斜。也指美丽。

Long
Basic explanation of words
Long
dié
(Sun) To the west: "Everyone will go to the market to buy, and they will all meet at the end of the day."
Long
yì
[Yang Li] Beautiful, such as "Zou Ji has more than eight feet, but his appearance is awkward."
Long
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dié］
["Guangyun" only knots, cuts, and sets. ]
(1) The sun is westward; sunset.
(2) Bright and beautiful. See "Yi Li".

[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Only knot cut [Positive rhyme] Du Jie cut,? Yin 耋. [Said the text] Japanese? 【Book·Wu Yi】From the Dynasty to the Rizhonghao. [Biography] From the morning to the sun. [Sparse] Hao is also named 昳, and the words fall in vain, saying that the time has come. [Previous Han · Ranger] Will be there until the end of the day.

Long
Name meaning
: The original meaning refers to the deflection at noon. Also refers to beauty.
dié, yì
1) dié клониться к западу
时加日昳 часы нарастают, и к западу клонится солнце
2) yì см. 昳丽
